commit message: Directly access getActivity instead of SherlockActivity where it is not necessary.

- Added unused fields to improve article parsing
- Improved logging output
- Removed unused code
Fix display of author in html template
More structured info in error report
Add 'Copy URL to clipboard' option to context menu of URLs
Moved MyApplication.java, Model was the wrong package.

- Re-organized layout-folders
- Fixed layout bug when no size for divider was stored
Added LOG-Tags for most classes, replaced the central Utils.TAG.
Moved option menu items into fragments
Fix duplicate virtual categories when no unread articles exist
Really fix duplicate virtual categories when no unread articles exist
Fix long-press menus and wrong handler beeing called for actions, every fragment needs its own item ids.
Fix 'go back after mark all read'

== Version 1.73 ==
* Fixed 'Go back after mark all read'
* Added style for blockquote-tag
* Improved logging and error reporting
* Add 'Copy URL to clipboard' option to context menu of URLs
* Fixed long-press on feed getting redirected to category
* Fixed duplicate virtual categories when no unread articles exist
* Attemted fix for large tablets getting no tablet layout
